resources.string:
Stand Up helps you stay healthy by reminding you to stand up periodically whenever you plan on sitting down for prolonged periods of time. Start a session when you plan on sitting down and customize the timer settings for standing and sitting.

I hope this app is useful to you! You're more than welcome to forward your questions/comments/feedback to:

This software is provided as-is, with no warranty of any kind.\n\nYour usage of this app is done at your own risk, and in no event shall the developer be liable for personal injury or any incidental, special, indirect, or consequential damages whatsoever.
